INSERT INTO tb_meeting SET uuid = #{uuid}, title = #{title}, date = #{date}, creator_id = #{creatorId},
place = #{place},
start = #{start}, end = #{end}, type = #{type}, members = #{members}, `desc` = #{desc}, instance_id = #{instanceId}, status = #{status}, create_time = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.uuid, m.title, u2.name, DATE_FORMAT(m.date,'%Y年%m月%d日') AS date, m.place, DATE_FORMAT(m.start,'%H:%i') AS start, DATE_FORMAT(m.end,'%H:%i') AS end, m.type, m.status, m.desc, u2.photo, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,CONCAT(m.date," ",m.start),CONCAT(m.date," ",m.end)) AS hour FROM tb_meeting m JOIN tb_user u1 ON JSON_CONTAINS(m.members,CAST(u1.id AS CHAR)) JOIN tb_user u2 ON m.creator_id=u2.id WHERE u1.id = #{userId} AND u1.status = 1 AND u2.status = 1 AND m.status IN(3,4) ORDER BY m.date,m.start,m.id LIMIT #{start}, #{length}
SELECT IF(COUNT(DISTINCT u.dept_id)=1,TRUE,FALSE ) AS bool FROM tb_meeting m JOIN tb_user u ON JSON_CONTAINS ( m.members, CAST( u.id AS CHAR ) ) WHERE m.uuid=#{uuid} AND u.status = 1

select m.uuid, m.creator_id as creatorId, m.title, u.name, DATE_FORMAT(m.date,'%Y-%m-%d') as date, m.place, DATE_FORMAT(m.start,'%H:%i') as start, DATE_FORMAT(m.end,'%H:%i') as end, m.type, m.status, m.desc, m.instance_id as instanceId from tb_meeting m join tb_user u on u.id=m.creator_id where m.id=#{id} and u.status=1
select u.id, u.name, u.photo from tb_meeting m join tb_user u on JSON_CONTAINS(m.members,cast(u.id as char )) where m.id=#{id} and u.status=1;
